CancelSign in![four people having a conversation in an office setting](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/QuantumReady_Header_2800x1040:320-539)
### Quantum Ready

Future proof your organization today for a quantum-powered tomorrow

### Build a robust strategy for
quantum today and tomorrow

As quantum technology rapidly evolves, organizations must take proactive steps to stay ahead. Microsoft’s **Quantum Ready program** helps business and government leaders assess the real-world impact of quantum, define a clear strategy, and build organizational readiness to future proof their investments and harness the full power of quantum as it scales.

## Assess quantum's impact on your organization

Understand how resilient quantum computing, integrated with AI and classical supercomputing, will unlock new growth for your organization.

## Define your strategy

Prepare your people, processes, and culture for a quantum future with considerations for ethics, risks, and applications with the highest near-term value.

## Execute a quantum application roadmap

Plan for the most promising use cases, and cultivate technical expertise so that you’re ready to innovate with solutions that enhance your competitive edge.

### Start your journey

Access expert insights, tools, and resources to develop a well-defined strategy and identify steps to ensure long-term success in the quantum era.

![Safety in the Era of Quantum](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV_MS_SCALE_QUANTUM_INBAR_v2_2370x1578:320-539)Define
#### Safety in the Era of Quantum

Dive into key considerations and techniques to help you stay safe in a future powered by quantum computing, with a programmatic approach to becoming quantum safe as you embark on your quantum ready journey.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/SafetyInTheEraOfQuantum)![Quantum for Government](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV-MS-QUANTUM_KATE_2370x1578:320-539)Execute
#### Quantum for Government

Understand how quantum technology along with AI and HPC could help public sector organizations enhance economic development, bolster national security, and drive positive societal impact.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/QuantumWP)![Demystifying Quantum](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV-MS-QUANTUM_WOODY_2370x1578:320-539)Execute
#### Demystifying Quantum

Explore the history and foundational concepts of quantum in a format tailored to a non-technical audience to help you envision transformational opportunities for your organization.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/DemystifyingQuantum)![Quantum Ready: Why Quantum, Why now?](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV-MS-QUANTUM_MITRA_SHORT_2370x1578:320-539)Assess
#### Why Quantum, Why Now?

Discover how quantum technology is poised to revolutionize industries, learn why early adoption can give you a competitive edge, and explore breakthrough discoveries from Microsoft and industry-leading partners.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/WhyQuantumNowDocument)![Organizational Implications of Quantum](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV-MS-QUANTUM_NICK_2370x1578:320-539)Define
#### Organizational Implications of Quantum

Understand the organizational change required to lead in the quantum era through a structured approach to business transformation aligned with your organization's objectives.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/QuantumStrategyDocument)![Quantum for Industry](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/EFV-MS-QUANTUM_Ester_Nathan_2370x1578:320-539)Execute
#### Quantum for Industry

Envision real-world applications across key industries that could be unlocked with a scalable quantum computer powered by 1 million qubits.

[Watch now](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)[Learn more](https://aka.ms/QuantumForIndustryDocument)
### Quantum ready

## Assess the business impact of quantum

Understand how resilient quantum computing, integrated with AI and classical supercomputing, will unlock new growth for your business

## Define a quantum-ready business strategy

Prepare your people, processes, and culture for a quantum future with considerations for ethics, risks, and applications with the highest near-term value

## Execute a quantum application roadmap

Identify and plan for the most promising use cases, and cultivate technical expertise within your teams so that you’re ready to innovate with hybrid solutions that enhance your competitive edge

### Explore more quantum ready resources

![Materials science in the era of reliable quantum computing](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/QuantumReady_ExploreResources_MaterialScienceAI_2370x1578:320-539)
#### Materials science in the era of reliable quantum computing

Learn how quantum computing could impact materials science research and the real-world use cases that could be enabled by combining quantum, AI, and HPC.

[Read the eBook](https://aka.ms/MaterialsScienceQuantumEbook)![Quantum for good and the societal impact](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/QuantumReady_ExploreResources_1_2370x1578:320-539)
#### Quantum for good and the societal impact

Learn more about the three priorities - impact, use, access - that are required to promote positive applications of quantum computing.

[Read the paper](https://aka.ms/quantumready/quantumforgood)![Accelerating drug discovery with HPC, AI, and quantum](https://quantum.scene7.com/is/image/quantum/QuantumReady_ExploreResources_2_2370x1578:320-539)
#### Accelerating drug discovery with HPC, AI, and quantum

Learn how AI and HPC technologies can enhance experimentation in drug discovery today, helping to set the stage for quantum-driven breakthroughs in the future.

[Download the eBook today](https://aka.ms/EbookAcceleratingDrugDiscoveryWithHPCAIAndQuantum)
#### Help shape tomorrow's quantum future

[Contact us](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/contact-us)Microsoft Quantum- [Microsoft Quantum overview](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/quantum-computing/)
- [Microsoft Quantum blog](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/)
- [Microsoft Quantum feedback](https://forms.office.com/r/xXc0v4WHLx)
Technical resources- [Github documentation](https://github.com/microsoft/qsharp)
- [Technical blogs](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/insights/blogs)
- [Microsoft Tech Community](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com)
Additional Resources- [Documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/quantum/)
- [Terms of Use](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/terms-of-use)

Company- [About Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/about)

- [Diversity and inclusion](https://www.microsoft.com/diversity/)
[English (United States)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/locale)[Your Privacy Choices](https://aka.ms/yourcaliforniaprivacychoices)[Consumer Health Privacy](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2259814)- [Sitemap](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sitemap1.aspx)
- [Contact Microsoft](https://support.microsoft.com/contactus)
- [Privacy](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521839)
- [Manage cookies](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/quantum-ready/get-started)

result.summary:
The provided webpage content does not contain any information about **readyforquantum.com**. There is no mention of a website by that name, nor is it referenced in the content.

The content primarily discusses **Microsoft's Quantum Ready program**, which is part of Microsoft's broader quantum computing initiative. Key points from the content include:

- **Quantum Ready** is a program designed to help organizations (businesses and government) assess the impact of quantum computing, define strategies, and build readiness for future quantum technologies.
- It includes resources such as:
  - Assessing business impact and organizational implications.
  - Defining strategies with considerations for ethics, risks, and near-term applications.
  - Executing a quantum application roadmap with focus areas like materials science, drug discovery, and government use cases.
- Resources available include:
  - eBooks (e.g., on materials science, drug discovery).
  - Educational videos (e.g., "Demystifying Quantum", "Why Quantum, Why Now?").
  - Tools and guides to help organizations prepare for quantum computing.
- The program emphasizes integration with AI and classical supercomputing, and highlights safety, societal impact, and industry-specific applications.

However, **readyforquantum.com** is not referenced, linked, or described in the content. Therefore, based on the provided information, there is **no data or details available about readyforquantum.com**.

•January 14, 2025• 4 min read
# 2025: The year to become Quantum-Ready

- By[Mitra Azizirad](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/author/mitra-azizirad/), President and Chief Operating Officer of Strategic Missions and Technologies @ Microsoft
 Share - [https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/)
- [https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/&text=2025:%20The%20year%20to%20become%20Quantum-Ready](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/&text=2025:%20The%20year%20to%20become%20Quantum-Ready)
- [https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/2025/01/14/2025-the-year-to-become-quantum-ready/)
- Content type
- [News](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/content-type/news/)
- Product
- [Azure Quantum](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/product/azure-quantum/)
- Tags
- [Quantinuum](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/tag/quantinuum-azure/)

We find ourselves in an exciting and pivotal time. We are at the advent of the [reliable quantum computing era](https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/2024/09/10/microsoft-announces-the-best-performing-logical-qubits-on-record-and-will-provide-priority-access-to-reliable-quantum-hardware-in-azure-quantum/). This past November, Microsoft successfully created and entangled [24 logical qubits](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fazure.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fblog%2Fquantum%2F2024%2F11%2F19%2Fmicrosoft-and-atom-computing-offer-a-commercial-quantum-machine-with-the-largest-number-of-entangled-logical-qubits-on-record%2F&data=05%7C02%7Csoreichelt%40microsoft.com%7C7eb66c57b62e42e1a79208dd359cef28%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C638725670320130645%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=WHSysu25tKsRyHtImZmYZz8SdI%2FDBZytXqbSNyE1FN8%3D&reserved=0) in collaboration with Atom Computing. As our industry looks toward the next 12 months, the pace of quantum research and development is only going to accelerate, making this a critical and catalyzing time for business leaders to act. We’re seeing a growing need for business leaders to have the information and tools to understand better the depth of these amazing technical breakthroughs and the business applications and value they open up. [In a business decision-maker study](https://www.hfsresearch.com/research/understanding-quantum-computing/), 12% said their organizations were prepared to assess quantum opportunities. Clearly, there is an urgent need for leaders to get more information and better understand how technical advancements in quantum will enable real-world impact.

Leaders in global companies, investment funds, and governments across the world are making [multi-billion-dollar investments](https://www.mckinsey.com/featured-insights/the-rise-of-quantum-computing) in quantum computing. Those organizations that are in the throes of planning a comprehensive quantum-ready strategy are creating durable, competitive differentiation for their organizations and positioning themselves to harness the full power of quantum as it scales. Clearly, without strategic readiness, it’s a challenging proposition for leaders to assess the risks and returns, or to design effective and responsible quantum strategies that are necessary to create a full-on quantum roadmap for their organization.

This is why at Microsoft we are excited to announce our new [Quantum Ready program](https://aka.ms/QRSignUp), designed to address these exact challenges by providing business leaders with the insights and tools needed to:

1. Build practical, high-impact hybrid applications.
2. Invest in strategic skilling and access to reliable quantum computers for experimentation.
3. Embrace quantum safety and focus on cryptographic agility.
4. Prepare for scale such that your investments are future-proofed.

Becoming quantum-ready is both a business and a global imperative. In fact, [the United Nations announced](https://quantum2025.org/) 2025 as the International Year of Quantum Science and Technology (IYQ), reflecting the transformative impact quantum mechanics has had in the past century, and setting the stage for the next wave of quantum innovation. As part of this global initiative, Microsoft will be a leading partner with the IYQ, along with the American Physical Society (APS), to celebrate 100 years of quantum innovation. We are so excited to partner with APS and other leading institutions to support the IYQ as it engages with communities from across the world to scale awareness of how quantum science and applications will transform industries.

![](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/MSC24-ASEAN-developer-Getty-1469706471-rgb-1024x560.webp)
## Quantum Ready

Quantum Ready can help future proof your organization today for a quantum-powered tomorrow

[Explore the program](https://aka.ms/QuantumReadyPage)
## Hybrid applications: Business value and security for today and tomorrow

Given the rapid pace of innovation, it’s critical that organizations start exploring, identifying, and building an application roadmap that sets them up for success in a quantum future. Doing so will clarify where and when quantum will provide tangible business value and guide both how and to what degree, you should invest to become quantum-ready today.

Through our Quantum Ready program, leaders will have an opportunity to engage with Microsoft in one-on-one workshops and industry-specific forums to accelerate their strategic readiness and identify high-value use cases. We hope to bring learnings that result from these industry-specific forums to the broader ecosystem to provide practical insights in the form of custom industry outlook reports to help guide your organization’s leadership and company strategy.

Additionally, business leaders need to start preparing for a quantum-safe future; not because there is an immediate threat but because a transition to emerging cryptographic standards will take time. Security is a top priority at Microsoft—this is why we established the [Microsoft Quantum Safe](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/blog/2023/11/01/starting-your-journey-to-become-quantum-safe/?msockid=0f399cbfe8276a652dff89f5e9b76b3f) Program to enable security alignment from both business and technical perspectives.

## Cultivating a quantum-ready culture: Skilling and vision for the hybrid era

Cultivating a culture of innovation begins with robust workforce skilling and training, empowering teams with the knowledge and mindset to embrace quantum-enabled possibilities. Putting this mindset into practice requires providing access to a unified hybrid platform integrating resilient quantum computing, classical supercomputing, and AI. Especially when [76% of leaders indicate that a quantum skills crisis](https://www.techmonitor.ai/technology/emerging-technology/quantum-computing-enterprise?cf-view) is causing a deceleration in innovation, the organizations that can harness the power of these complementary technologies—and who understand their use is not a matter of *either or*, but *when*and *how*—are in a distinct position to stay ahead.

Our Quantum Ready program will offer different skilling and training opportunities to help prepare business and government leaders with resources, frameworks, and tools they need to:

- Understand why quantum technology is positioned to help revolutionize your business operations, talent strategies, and infrastructure.
- Gain an early-mover competitive edge by creating a quantum strategy that aligns the technology’s potential with your specific business and innovation goals.
- Explore deep insight and guidance into the impact quantum computing will make in your industry and what it means for your organization.

## Acting for success: Preparation for scale with the right partner

So, where and how should organizations start? Navigating the many skilling, strategy, and culture considerations is not easy, and it requires the right partners: those with experience putting state-of-the-art hybrid tools into practice with real-world, impactful applications; those who carefully consider the risks quantum pose and are working to mitigate them with leading security solutions and commitments to safe use; and finally, those with an open ecosystem approach to future-proof your investments.

From envisioning new use cases and identifying co-innovation opportunities to receiving first access to visionary industry insights, outlook reports, skilling, workshops, and other exciting new programs to come, sign up here to join [Microsoft’s Quantum Ready program](https://aka.ms/QRSignUp). We look forward to connecting with you soon!

## Learn how Microsoft can help you become quantum ready

- Join the [Quantum Ready program](https://aka.ms/QRSignUp).
- Explore the video learning modules in our [Quantum Ready program](https://aka.ms/QuantumReadyPage).
[Azure Quantum — Discover our solutions](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/azure-quantum-elements)![Mitra Headshot](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Mitra-Headshot.png) Mitra Azizirad  President and Chief Operating Officer of Strategic Missions and Technologies @ Microsoft [http://linkedin.com/in/mitra-azizirad](http://linkedin.com/in/mitra-azizirad) Mitra Azizirad is the President and Chief Operating Officer for Microsoft’s Strategic Missions and Technologies organization. She is focused on turning innovation into new business categories, and driving value and growth for commercial, industry, and government customers by bringing transformative next-generation technologies, such as quantum computing, to market. [See more articles from this author](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/quantum/author/mitra-azizirad/)

## Explore
 Microsoft Quantum applications

Start building impactful quantum chemistry and materials science applications today.

result.summary:
The website **readyforquantum.com** does not appear to exist or be referenced in the provided content. The content retrieved is from **azure.microsoft.com**, specifically a blog post titled *"2025: The year to become Quantum-Ready"* published on January 14, 2025.

However, based on the content, here is relevant information about **Microsoft’s Quantum Ready program**, which may be what the user was seeking:

### Microsoft Quantum Ready Program (Related to Quantum Computing)
- **Purpose**: A strategic initiative by Microsoft to help business leaders and organizations prepare for the future of quantum computing.
- **Announcement Date**: January 14, 2025.
- **Key Objectives**:
  1. **Build practical, high-impact hybrid applications** that combine classical computing with quantum computing.
  2. **Invest in strategic skilling and access** to reliable quantum computers for experimentation.
  3. **Embrace quantum safety** and focus on cryptographic agility (transitioning to quantum-resistant encryption).
  4. **Prepare for scale** to ensure investments remain future-proof.
- **Target Audience**: Business leaders, government organizations, and investment funds.
- **Program Features**:
  - One-on-one workshops and industry-specific forums.
  - Custom industry outlook reports to guide strategic decisions.
  - Video learning modules and training resources.
- **Access**: Users can sign up for the program via [https://aka.ms/QRSignUp](https://aka.ms/QRSignUp).
- **Related Resources**:
  - [Quantum Ready Program Page](https://aka.ms/QuantumReadyPage)
  - [Azure Quantum Solutions](https://quantum.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/azure-quantum-elements)
  - [Microsoft Quantum Safe Program](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/blog/2023/11/01/starting-your-journey-to-become-quantum-safe/)

### Technical Milestones Mentioned
- In November 2024, Microsoft and Atom Computing successfully created and entangled **24 logical qubits**, marking a significant advancement in reliable quantum computing.
- Microsoft is advancing quantum error correction with novel **four-dimensional error-correction codes** (announced June 19, 2025).

### Global Context
- The United Nations has designated **2025 as the International Year of Quantum Science and Technology (IYQ)**, with Microsoft partnering with the American Physical
